q1: I believe this team is going to win
a1: Colombia are good but I think they must improve to win a world cup.
q2: Where do you think they need to improve the most?
a2: They need more strength in depth. When Rodriguez and Falcao aren't playing they struggle
q3: Did frances world cup winning team have any players that should have played for columbia?
q4: Who is Colombia's best defender right now?
a4: Right now their best defender is probably Juan Cuadrado.
a5: of course he is a good header.
